name: CatTranslator
0:
”Alexa, Open Cat Translator”
”Alexa, Ask Cat Translator how do you say Hello”
”Alexa, Play Cat Translator”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cat translator
des:
Use Alexa to speak to your cat!

We all know that cats have always seen the human race as inferior, but now the tables may have turned... You can now learn to speak to your feline friend!



HOW TO USE THE SKILL:

Just enable the skill. 
Then say "Alexa, Ask Cat Translator how do you say Hello"
Cat translator will reply with correct way of saying hello in Cat.



Warning! Cats could be scared of your new powers and run away.

Enjoy

Hugo.FM and all the Cats

₍⸍⸌̣ʷ̣̫⸍̣⸌₎


FEEDBACK:

Purr-fect feedback? Yay! Hit that review button and write a review telling me what you liked. It will make my day and give me the energy to keep making more content for our cat overlords.

Negative feedback? Bummer! I will do my best to fix the issue. Use this Link: 
https://hugo.fm/contact
Fill out the form and I will see what I can do to help you. Purr-haps you just prefer dogs.
